data.eml:eml: The sawflies and woodwasps (Hymenoptera: ‘ Symphyta’) of Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Malagón-Aldana, Leonardo A., Smith, David R., Vilhelmsen, Lars, Serna, Francisco (2019): The sawflies and woodwasps (Hymenoptera: ‘ Symphyta’) of Colombia. Zootaxa 4633 (1): 1-88, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4633.1.1
